CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this optional picklist field to control the available values displayed to the end user for the sub-status field. By default, it is blank. An admin is required to configure the picklist values and use Matrix Manager to institute these values.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This auto-populated field can display the status of the requirement, and determines the available sub-status of the requirement in process.
CustomField.label: Sub-Status Attribute
